file_intent: Utility helpers for string, data, and general-purpose operations

responsibility_blocks.description: Utilities to normalize strings for URLs or IDs
responsibility_blocks.label: Slugification and text normalization

responsibility_blocks.description: Capitalize first character of a string
responsibility_blocks.label: Capitalization

responsibility_blocks.description: Deep clone plain objects and arrays, preserving dates
responsibility_blocks.label: Deep cloning of generic objects

responsibility_blocks.description: Group array elements by key function or property
responsibility_blocks.label: Grouping by key

responsibility_blocks.description: Debounce function calls to limit frequency
responsibility_blocks.label: Function debounce

responsibility_blocks.description: Retry async function with backoff until success or max attempts
responsibility_blocks.label: Retry wrapper for async operations

responsibility_blocks.description: Format bytes into human-readable string with suffixes
responsibility_blocks.label: Byte formatting utility

responsibility_blocks.description: Check if value is a plain object
responsibility_blocks.label: Plain object detection

responsibility_blocks.description: Export utility functions as module API
responsibility_blocks.label: Module exports (API surface)
